description:
This "management studio only" package is a 160 MB download, rather than 1000 MB for the advanced installer  It does not include the SQL engine nor "Advanced Services (Full Text Search and Reporting Services).

This package depends on the dotnet 3.5 package because the SQL Express installer seems to have difficulty resolving this dependency consistently on its own.

This package includes the SQL installer switches to do a default install as such:  

/Action=Install /FEATURES=CONN,BC,SSMS /IACCEPTSQLSERVERLICENSETERMS /Q

If you want to see progress add -InstallArgs '/INDICATEPROGRESS' when calling this package.

Tested on: Server 2012 R2
displayName: Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2 Express Management Studio Only
summary: Installs only the SQL Server Express 2008 R2 Management Studio (SMSS) - this is a 160 MB download instead of 1000 MB for the advanced installer.
author: Microsoft
